name: Blip
short_description:
Blip is an online media platform that provides its users with access to video
clips and programs related to media and entertainment.
long_description:
Blip is an online media platform that provides its users with access to video
clips and programs related to media and entertainment. It provides its users
with access programs and video clips related to general entertainment, comedy,
music, drama, television, food, video games, and more. In addition, it
categorizes its content into three segments: editors' picks, current video and
program trends, and new episodes of programs. It also provides producers with a
suite of tools to host, distribute, and monetize their web series. Blip was
founded on May 1, 2005 by Charles Hope and Jared Klett. It is based in New York
City, New York.
